Texts.Chs: ...这就是为什么你的长袍永远不会被使用的原因。 你不想要那样，对吧？ 为了你的兜帽，你已经使用了陆个诺克石锭，壹个沃尔坦核心和壹个远古核心 ...好了，请确保你不要使用它，或者...
Texts.Eng: ...and that is why your robe is never to be used in lieu of toilet paper. You'd not want that, right? As for your hood, which you of course already made using six Nocxium, a Valtan Casing and an Elder Core...well, just be sure you don't go using that, either...

Texts.Chs: 关于信徒服饰的获取指南
Texts.Eng: A cultists guide to proper hood attire

Texts.Chs: 信徒真正的服饰 - 兜帽
